title: in-game not connecting
body: Is anyone having trouble loading into game? After champ select and heading to load screen, i get the "Reconnect" option and no matter how many times i click on it, I can not get into game. This has only just started to happen. First in a norms game and now with a custom game that I started to see if it was still occurring after I did a repair on client.

replies.body: oh i got into post game ok but could not get into the game. thanks for providing me a leavebuster through no fault of my own. Tried a custom game, same deal can not connect. I am really fuming about the loss of LP earlier in the night now. this has only been occurring since last patch. guess i wait to see if this is fixed with the next patch.

Nope did not help 4th game in a row now not able to get straightinto game after champ selct. this time tho i have not been able to get back into game. probably going to get a leavebuster now. i am done. cya rito, let me know via email when this is resolved. 1:20 am and i have no more tolerance for this bs.

That repair might be able to help if some of the game files are damaged, but let's double check some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well. There's a good chance that something in those settings is blocking your network from getting a solid connection with our servers which is why that reconnect button isn't working.
